void nitf_ImageReader_setReadCaching ( nitf_ImageReader *  iReader  ) 

nitf_ImageReader_setReadCaching - Enable cached reads

nitf_ImageReader_setReadCaching enables cached reads. Enabling cached reads causes the system to read full blocks of data and then satisfy individual read requests from these buffered blocks. A cache of block buffers is maintained. This is usually more efficent in terms of reading but requires more memory.

Returns:
None
Parameters:
iReader Object to modify
